title: Locked at 60 FPS V-Sync off
body:
I am locked at 60 frames per second no matter what I do. I've uninstalled/reinstalled, repaired, restarted my computer, disabled firewall, all that stuff. No V-Sync IS NOT ON. I repeat, V-Sync IS NOT ON. I am also UNCAPPED. I am looking for a solution to the problem, not for people to tell me you cant see the difference. I know it does not affect my play, I know I will not see an improvement, I just want to go back to getting my regular frame rate. Below are my specs and I appreciate the help.
NVIDIA GeForce 960m (Yes its a laptop, no Im not going to build a PC)
16 GB RAM (2 dedicated to video)
i7 core
1 TB Memory
Running 64 bit Windows 10.

Also, this problem was not there before the big windows 10 update this morning.

replies.body: Thank you so much! It brought my frames right back up to normal. I appreciate the help.
